data.message: Yeah, but you gotta understand what it does to a family when someone dies then they get hauled off to be farmed of there organs. What most people don't understand is that, yes, donating your is a nice jester, but, doctors make millions off of your donation. If i knew my organ was going to save someone's life that didn't have to pay millions i probably would donate. Plus, u gotta understand your organs might be saving the life of POS.
